data.name: Command Heroes Demo
data.detailed_description:
In Command Heroes, you control a Hero from one of many Factions in the game each with unique abilities, equipment, and perks to unlock. Battle it out in a mash-up between a twin-stick action platformer & RTS blend. Unlock new units, weapons, buildings, & equipment. Upgrade your crew between matches, and press onward towards victory! Team up with up to 3 friends for 4-player split-screen action, or set up a custom sandbox map with up to 10 players & AI.

Factions

Each faction has diverse units, buildings, weapons, and heroes. Shift and shape your strategy accordingly. Surprise your enemies with unlimited play-style approaches. Will you attack from above, below, or both? Whether you approach with style & finesse or overwhelm by brute force, you’ll be faced with new challenges and find new strategies each match.

1-10 Multiplayer Co-op or Versus

Play solo, or with 1-4 local players (or online players via Remote Play Together) in a hectic resource race. Set up custom matches with full flexibility on team alliances between players & AI. Up to 10 players & AI total.

Survival Game Mode

Fend off waves of enemies with a brief respite to repair & build. Team up with other players to survive together. How many waves can you survive? Try to beat your personal best.

Dig Deep

Head underground (or to orbiting moons!) to discover artifacts of mystical or technological power which can help turn the tide in your team’s favor. Summon an ancient stone golem, an orbital satellite strike, or dozens of other sources of destruction, healing, wealth, and power. Defend artifacts once revealed or that power can fall into your enemy’s hands. All teams are notified when a high value Artifact has been detected, so they can race to the location arena and battle for control. Perhaps instead, you will use this chance to strike your enemy's base on the surface while they are busy claiming the Artifact.

DEMO NOTES

You are limited to a predefined game mode: a custom match with 2 enemy AIs. You are able to choose between 2 of the Factions in the game.
Most importantly, thanks for checking out our game!

data.short_description: Command Heroes is a local multiplayer, Action RTS with destructible environments. Battle it out in a mash-up between a twin-stick action platformer & RTS blend. Play with 1-3 friends for 4-player split-screen action. Set up custom matches with up to 10 players & AI* (in full version).

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Intel i3 or Ryzen 3 series
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: Intel i7 or Ryzen 7 series
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Intel i3 or Ryzen 3 series
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: Intel i7 or Ryzen 7 series
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Intel i3 or Ryzen 3 series
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: Intel i7 or Ryzen 7 series
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
